thread.title: WATCH: Oregon wins on Dillon Brooks 3 with 0.2 seconds left
thread.title_full: WATCH: Oregon wins on Dillon Brooks 3 with 0.2 seconds left

title: WATCH: Oregon wins on Dillon Brooks 3 with 0.2 seconds left
text:
WATCH: Oregon wins on Dillon Brooks 3 with 0.2 seconds left Joe Boozell | NCAA.com Contact | Archive | RSS 
Wednesday was one of the craziest college basketball nights of the season. Thanks for the exclamation point, Dillon Brooks. 
Oregon trailed for the most of the evening against Cal, but in the end, the Ducks wouldn’t be denied. Specifically, Brooks wouldn’t be denied. His latest edition of heroics: — GoDucks (@GoDucks) February 23, 2017 DILLON BROOKS! A 3 with 0.2 seconds left caps No. 6 Oregon's comeback from 16 down in 68-65 win at Cal. pic.twitter.com/xqSGLG8XyF — NCAA March Madness (@marchmadness) February 23, 2017 
Brooks’ game-winning 3 knocked off then-No. 2 UCLA earlier this season, too. It’s safe to say the guy has ice water in his veins. 
Oregon plays Stanford next on Saturday. The Ducks are now 25-4, 14-2 in Pac-12 play. Advertisement
